data.name: bypass_confirmation
data.marketing: A plugin to allow us to bypass the confirmation page if required.
data.description: A plugin to allow us to bypass the confirmation page if required.  Note that if the property manager has more than one gateway configured then this plugin does not come into effect, because the payment method selection in the confirmation page needs to be accessed by the guest.
data.change_log: v1.1  Modified plugin to ensure correct use of jomresURL function. v1.2 Added custom field handling functionality. v1.3 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.4 Site Config setting added that enables / disables plugin. v1.5 Modified how array contents are checked. v1.6 Fixed an issue created by new gateway code. v1.7 French language file added. v1.8 Italian language file added, thanks Nicola  v1.9 Language files updated v2.0 Documentation updated. v2.1 Changed how bypass confirmation works. Now allows the booking confirmation page to render in a hidden div, then redirects the user to the processpayment page. This allows the NBE data to be properly setup before the user gets again forwarded to payment
data.author: Vince Wooll
